field.name: title
field.title: Title
field.comment: The AbsenceType title. There can't be more than one entity with the same title

field.name: weight
field.title: Weight
field.comment: The weight value is used to order the types on a list

field.name: color
field.title: Colour
field.comment: The color hex value (including the #) used to display this type on a calendar

field.name: is_default
field.title: Is default?
field.comment: There can only be one default entity at any given time

field.name: is_reserved
field.title: Is reserved?
field.comment: Reserved entities are used by internal calculations and cannot be deleted.

field.name: max_consecutive_leave_days
field.title: Duration of consecutive leave permitted to be taken at once

field.name: allow_request_cancelation
field.title: Can staff cancel requests for this leave type after they have been made?
field.comment: Can only be one of the values defined in AbsenceType::REQUEST_CANCELATION_OPTIONS

field.name: allow_overuse
field.title: Can employee apply for this leave type even if they have used up their entitlement for the year?

field.name: must_take_public_holiday_as_leave
field.title: Must staff take public holiday as leave

field.name: default_entitlement
field.title: Default entitlement
field.comment: The number of days entitled for this type

field.name: add_public_holiday_to_entitlement
field.title: By default should public holiday be added to the default entitlement?

field.name: is_active
field.title: Is enabled?
field.comment: Only enabled types can be requested

field.name: allow_accruals_request
field.title: Allow staff to request to accrue additional days leave of this type during the period

field.name: max_leave_accrual
field.title: Maximum amount of leave that can be accrued of this absence type during a period
field.comment: Value is the number of days that can be accrued. Null means unlimited

field.name: allow_accrue_in_the_past
field.title: Can staff request to accrue leave for dates in the past?

field.name: accrual_expiration_unit
field.comment: The unit (months or days) of accrual_expiration_duration of this type default expiry

field.name: allow_carry_forward
field.title: Allow leave of this type to be carried forward from one period to another?

field.name: max_number_of_days_to_carry_forward
field.title: Maximum number of days that can be carried forward to a new period?

field.name: carry_forward_expiration_unit
field.comment: The unit (months or days) of carry_forward_expiration_duration of this type default expiry

field.name: is_sick
field.label: Is Sick?
field.comment: A flag which is used to determine if this Absence Type can be used for a Sickness Request
